# MoreStars

> Turn every customer into a 5-star Google review. SMS and QR code review request software for local businesses.

MoreStars helps local businesses get more Google reviews through automated SMS requests and scannable QR codes. When a customer completes a transaction, they receive a text message with a direct link to leave a Google review. Businesses can also print QR codes for counters, receipts, or tables.

## How It Works

1. Connect your Google Business Profile
2. Import customers via CSV or integrate with your POS system
3. Send SMS review requests or generate QR codes
4. Customers tap once and land directly on your Google review page
5. Track results in your analytics dashboard

## Key Features

- SMS Review Requests: Automated text messages sent after transactions
- QR Code Generation: Printable codes for physical locations
- Google Business Integration: Direct links to your review page
- Analytics Dashboard: Track review requests, opens, and conversions
- POS Integrations: Connect with Square, Shopify, and more
- Multi-location Support: Manage multiple business locations

## Pricing

$77/month flat rate. No per-SMS fees. Unlimited review requests.

## Target Customers

- Restaurants and cafes
- Auto repair shops
- Salons and spas
- Dental and medical practices
- Home service providers (plumbers, electricians, HVAC)
- Retail stores
- Any local business that wants more Google reviews

## Contact

- Website: https://morestars.io
- Email: hello@morestars.io
